about_the_game:
A new fantasy adventure in RTS form

Explore the dark, mystical land of Runetide in Glyphs of the East, a single-player real-time strategy game. Unravel ancient glyphs, harness their power, and command forces in a battle against shadowy foes. Master strategy and magic in a world where every move shapes your destiny.

Expand your civilization

Establish and fortify your civilization, infusing it with arcane glyphs to unlock unique abilities and defenses. Develop your base into a thriving stronghold, balancing resource management with strategic expansion as you prepare for the oncoming darkness.

Wield spell and sword

Lead an army that blends the might of medieval warriors and archers with the mystical powers of mages and druids. Deploy knights alongside spellcasters, combining brute strength with arcane spells to outmaneuver your enemies. Master the synergy between steel and sorcery to create unstoppable forces that can adapt to any threat in the shadowy realm of Runetide.

Uncover the dark mysteries of Runetide

Every glyph tells a tale and every shadow hides a secret. A darkness haunts Runetide, drawing you deeper into a world where ancient powers clash. What will you uncover as you explore the forgotten ruins and decipher their cryptic glyphs?

A new fantasy adventure in RTS form

Explore the dark, mystical land of Runetide in Glyphs of the East, a single-player real-time strategy game. Unravel ancient glyphs, harness their power, and command forces in a battle against shadowy foes. Master strategy and magic in a world where every move shapes your destiny.

Establish and fortify your civilization, infusing it with arcane glyphs to unlock unique abilities and defenses. Develop your base into a thriving stronghold, balancing resource management with strategic expansion as you prepare for the oncoming darkness.

Wield spell and sword

Lead an army that blends the might of medieval warriors and archers with the mystical powers of mages and druids. Deploy knights alongside spellcasters, combining brute strength with arcane spells to outmaneuver your enemies. Master the synergy between steel and sorcery to create unstoppable forces that can adapt to any threat in the shadowy realm of Runetide.

Uncover the dark mysteries of Runetide

Every glyph tells a tale and every shadow hides a secret. A darkness haunts Runetide, drawing you deeper into a world where ancient powers clash. What will you uncover as you explore the forgotten ruins and decipher their cryptic glyphs?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux with kernel version 5.10 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

name: Glyphs Of The East

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore the dark, mystical land of Runetide in Glyphs of the East, a single-player real-time strategy game. Unravel ancient glyphs, harness their power, and command forces in a battle against the shadows. Master strategy and magic, as every move shapes your civilization's destiny.
